sentence.Network_en: Polypodiaceae A family of terrestrial or epiphytic leptosporangiate ferns.
sentence.Network_cn: 水龙骨科:陆生或附生的薄囊蕨类的一个科.

sentence.Network_en: Old World tropical fern; in some classification systems placed directly in family Polypodiaceae.
sentence.Network_cn: 旧大陆的热带蕨; 在一些分类系统中直接归入水龙骨科.

means.word_mean: 1. ferns: a large family that in some classification systems has been subdivided into several families (including Aspleniaceae and Blechnaceae and Davalliaceae and Dennstaedtiaceae and Dryopteridaceae and Oleandraceae and Pteridaceae)
